short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enjoy new experiences with your bookmarks with Flippy!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you want to have a daily blog catchup? Or start your day with an inspirational dose from your favorite saved bookmarks? Or strengthen your daily reading habit with a timed tour of your saved to-read articles? Flippy is the extension designed to help you revisit your bookmarks smartly.

Key Features:

Surprise Discovery Every Tab: Each new tab opens a random bookmark from your specified folder, turning every tab into a delightful surprise. Discover hidden gems among your saved sites effortlessly.

Interactive Bookmark Tour: Dive deeper into your bookmarks with our "Tour" feature. Select a folder from the dropdown menu, and click the button to be redirected to each bookmark in sequence. It's like having a TV remote, letting you browse through your bookmarks one by one to find something interesting to explore.

Elevate your browsing experience by turning your bookmarks into a treasure trove of discoveries. Whether you're looking for a spontaneous surprise or a structured tour through your bookmarks, this extension leverages your saved sites to create a more dynamic and engaging browsing experience!
